body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married America Stone. Father of Claudius T. Stone, Elah V. Stone, William. S. Stone, James. T. Stone, John C. Stone, Sidney J. Stone, and Robert C. Stone. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.
